metadata.creator: Nintendo of Europe
metadata.description:
The song "Shrunk's Dream" portrays Shrunk having a successful show where he is applauded, as opposed to the negative reception he usually receives.Â 

"Town Square (K.K. Live Version)" is a remix of the City Theme, and would be later added to New Leaf as an invalid song and New Horizons as a secret song, Animal City.

Animal Crossing Your Favourite Songs Original Soundtrack was a soundtrack available to buy from the Club Nintendo website, using "stars". The item cost 2,000 stars and was only available in 2009. It is now a limited item and can no longer be purchased from the Club Nintendo store.

The booklet contained the titles of all 39 songs in English as well as a small thank you message at the bottom in Dutch, French, Netherlands-English and Dutch; Spanish, Italian and Portuguese.
